perturbation.original_text:
g. 
“Endorsed Product(s)” shall only mean and include Company’s irons, woods, wedges and putters.
perturbation.changed_text:
g. 
“Endorsed Product(s)” shall only mean and include Company’s irons and woods.
perturbation.explanation: By removing wedges and putters from the definition of "Endorsed Product(s)", there is a contradiction in section 6a, where it requires North to use F2 branded wedges. This omission creates confusion as wedges are no longer strictly under the agreement of "Endorsed Product(s)".

perturbation.original_text:
f. 
Late Payments. Amounts not received within ten (10) days following their respective due dates shall be assessed a late charge equal to 
one and one-half percent (1 _%) per month of the overdue amount until paid, commencing on the eleventh day.
perturbation.changed_text:
f. 
Late Payments. Amounts not received within ten (10) days following their respective due dates shall be assessed a late charge.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specific percentage for the late charge, section 7.f now contradicts other sections which may reference timely payments and remedies for non-payment based on a defined late charge. It creates ambiguity on how much the late charge is.

perturbation.original_text:
16.
Insurance. Company agrees, at its own expense, to obtain and maintain general comprehensive liability insurance, with an insurance 
company that has a rating of A++ (per AM Best), insuring North as a “named insured party”, against any claims, suits, losses and damages 
arising out of or caused by Company’s use of North’s Likeness. North’s Endorsement or North’s services hereunder. Such insurance policy 
shall be maintained with limits of not less than two million dollars ($2,000,000). Said policy of insurance shall remain in force for the duration 
of this Agreement. A copy of such insurance policy shall be provided to North within thirty (30) days after execution of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
16.
Insurance. Company agrees, at its own expense, to obtain and maintain general comprehensive liability insurance, insuring North as a “named insured party”, against any claims, suits, losses and damages 
arising out of or caused by Company’s use of North’s Likeness. North’s Endorsement or North’s services hereunder. Said policy of insurance shall remain in force for the duration 
of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By omitting the specific insurance rating (A++ per AM Best) and the minimum coverage amount ($2,000,000), section 16 now introduces uncertainty. Without specifying the rating and coverage amount, the clause requiring insurance becomes less enforceable, and may also contradict other sections referencing risk mitigation.
